+++ b/rtl/verilog/uart_receiver.v
@@ -272,16 +275,16 @@ begin
 			end
 	sr_ca_lc_parity : begin    // rcounter equals 6
 				rcounter16  <= #1 rcounter16_minus_1;
-//				rparity_xor <= #1 ^{rshift,rparity}; // calculate parity on all incoming data
-				rparity_xor <= #1 ^rshift; // calculate parity on all incoming data
+				rparity_xor <= #1 ^{rshift,rparity}; // calculate parity on all incoming data
+//				rparity_xor <= #1 ^rshift; // calculate parity on all incoming data
 				rstate      <= #1 sr_check_parity;
 			  end
 	sr_check_parity: begin	  // rcounter equals 5
 				case ({lcr[`UART_LC_EP],lcr[`UART_LC_SP]})
-				2'b00: rparity_error <= #1  rparity_xor != rparity;  // no error if parity 1
-				2'b01: rparity_error <= #1 ~rparity;      // parity should sticked to 1
-				2'b10: rparity_error <= #1 ~rparity_xor != rparity;   // error if parity is odd
-				2'b11: rparity_error <= #1  rparity;	  // parity should be sticked to 0
+					2'b00: rparity_error <= #1  rparity_xor == 0;  // no error if parity 1
+					2'b01: rparity_error <= #1 ~rparity;      // parity should sticked to 1
+					2'b10: rparity_error <= #1  rparity_xor == 1;   // error if parity is odd
+					2'b11: rparity_error <= #1  rparity;	  // parity should be sticked to 0
 				endcase
 				rcounter16 <= #1 rcounter16_minus_1;
 				rstate <= #1 sr_wait1;

ParseResult:
UPD HdlStmAssign@@ to 
    UPD HdlOp@@XOR_UNARY to XOR_UNARY
        INS list@@ops to XOR_UNARY
        INS HdlOp@@CONCAT to ops
        UPD HdlOp@@CONCAT to CONCAT
            INS HdlValueId@@rparity to ops

UPD HdlStmAssign@@ to 
    UPD HdlOp@@XOR_UNARY to XOR_UNARY
        MOV list@@ops to XOR_UNARY
        list: ops
            HdlValueId: rshift

UPD HdlStmAssign@@ to 
    UPD HdlOp@@NE to EQ
    UPD HdlOp@@NE to NE
        DEL HdlValueId@@rparity from ops

UPD HdlStmAssign@@ to 
    UPD HdlOp@@NE to NE
        UPD HdlOp@@NEG to EQ
        MOV HdlOp@@NEG to ops
        HdlOp: NEG
            list: ops
                HdlValueId: rparity_xor
        DEL HdlValueId@@rparity from ops
        DEL list@@ops from NE
    DEL HdlOp@@NE from 


CommitId: 36b177ddf680161600c5379e8fdb769c33c42957

--- a/rtl/verilog/uart_wb.v
+++ b/rtl/verilog/uart_wb.v
@@ -64,6 +64,15 @@
 // CVS Revision History
 //
 // $Log: not supported by cvs2svn $
+// Revision 1.10  2001/12/03 21:44:29  gorban
+// Updated specification documentation.
+// Added full 32-bit data bus interface, now as default.
+// Address is 5-bit wide in 32-bit data bus mode.
+// Added wb_sel_i input to the core. It's used in the 32-bit mode.
+// Added debug interface with two 32-bit read-only registers in 32-bit mode.
+// Bits 5 and 6 of LSR are now only cleared on TX FIFO write.
+// My small test bench is modified to work with 32-bit mode.
+//
 // Revision 1.9  2001/10/20 09:58:40  gorban
 // Small synopsis fixes
 //

        list: ops
            HdlValueId: reg
            HdlOp: DOWNTO
                list: ops
                    HdlValueInt: 31
                    HdlValueInt: 0
    HdlDirection: INTERNAL

 // synopsys translate_off

 // synopsys translate_on

+ 
 module uart_wb (clk, wb_rst_i, 
-	wb_we_i, wb_stb_i, wb_cyc_i, wb_ack_o,

 );
 

ParseResult:
INS HdlStmCase@@wbstate to body

INS HdlStmIf@@ to body

INS HdlStmAssign@@ to body
HdlStmAssign
    HdlValueInt: 1
    HdlValueId: wbstate
    HdlValueInt: 1

INS HdlStmAssign@@ to body

@@ -117,17 +127,23 @@ input 		  wb_we_i;
 input 		  wb_stb_i;
 input 		  wb_cyc_i;
 input [3:0]   wb_sel_i;
+input [`UART_ADDR_WIDTH-1:0] 	wb_adr_i; //WISHBONE address line
+
 `ifdef DATA_BUS_WIDTH_8
 input [7:0]  wb_dat_i; //input WISHBONE bus 
 output [7:0] wb_dat_o;
 reg [7:0] 	 wb_dat_o;
 wire [7:0] 	 wb_dat_i;
+reg [7:0] 	 wb_dat_is;
 `else // for 32 data bus mode
 input [31:0]  wb_dat_i; //input WISHBONE bus 
 output [31:0] wb_dat_o;
 reg [31:0] 	  wb_dat_o;
 wire [31:0]   wb_dat_i;
-`endif
+reg [31:0] 	  wb_dat_is;
+`endif // !`ifdef DATA_BUS_WIDTH_8
+
+output [`UART_ADDR_WIDTH-1:0]	wb_adr_int; // internal signal for address bus
 input [7:0]   wb_dat8_o; // internal 8 bit output to be put into wb_dat_o
 output [7:0]  wb_dat8_i;
 input [31:0]  wb_dat32_o; // 32 bit data output (for debug interface)

ParseResult:
INS HdlStmProcess@@ to objs
HdlStmProcess
    list: sensitivity
        HdlOp: RISING
            list: ops
                HdlValueId: clk
        HdlOp: RISING
            list: ops
                HdlValueId: wb_rst_i
    HdlStmIf: body
        HdlValueId: wb_rst_i
        HdlStmBlock: SEQ
            list: body
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wb_adr_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wb_we_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wb_cyc_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wb_stb_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wb_dat_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wb_sel_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
        list: elifs
        HdlStmBlock: SEQ
            list: body
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueId: wb_adr_i
                    HdlValueId: wb_adr_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueId: wb_we_i
                    HdlValueId: wb_we_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueId: wb_cyc_i
                    HdlValueId: wb_cyc_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueId: wb_stb_i
                    HdlValueId: wb_stb_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueId: wb_dat_i
                    HdlValueId: wb_dat_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueId: wb_sel_i
                    HdlValueId: wb_sel_is
                    HdlValueInt: 1

UPD HdlStmIf@@body to body
    INS HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to body
    UPD HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to SEQ
        INS list@@body to SEQ

INS HdlStmCase@@wbstate to body

UPD HdlStmCase@@wbstate to wbstate
    INS HdlStmCaseType@@CASE to wbstate
    INS HdlValueId@@wbstate to wbstate
    INS list@@cases to wbstate
    INS tuple@@ to cases
    INS tuple@@ to cases
    INS tuple@@ to cases
    tuple
        HdlValueInt: 2
        HdlStmBlock: SEQ
            list: body
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wb_ack_o
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wbstate
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wre
                    HdlValueInt: 1
    INS tuple@@ to cases
    tuple
        HdlValueInt: 3
        HdlStmBlock: SEQ
            list: body
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wb_ack_o
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wbstate
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: wre
                    HdlValueInt: 1
    INS HdlValueInt@@0 to 
    INS HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to 
    INS HdlValueInt@@1 to 
    INS HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to 
    UPD HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to SEQ
        INS list@@body to SEQ

INS HdlStmAssign@@ to body

INS HdlStmAssign@@ to body
HdlStmAssign
    HdlValueInt: 2
    HdlValueId: wbstate
    HdlValueInt: 1

INS HdlStmAssign@@ to body
HdlStmAssign
    HdlValueInt: 0
    HdlValueId: wre
    HdlValueInt: 1

UPD HdlStmIf@@ to 
    INS HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to 
    INS list@@elifs to 
    INS HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to 
    HdlStmBlock: SEQ
        list: body
            HdlStmAssign
                HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlValueId: wre
                HdlValueInt: 1
            HdlStmAssign
                HdlValueInt: 0
                HdlValueId: wb_ack_o
                HdlValueInt: 1

UPD HdlStmAssign@@ to 
    INS HdlValueInt@@1 to 
    INS HdlValueInt@@1 to

        UPD HdlOp@@AND_LOG to AND_LOG
            UPD HdlOp@@NEG_LOG to NEG_LOG

CommitId: a994b49d10bf2355111716b312deaf16df083393
Stop bit bug fixed.
--- a/rtl/verilog/uart_regs.v
+++ b/rtl/verilog/uart_regs.v
@@ -214,6 +217,23 @@ begin
     else
 	wb_dat_o <= #1 8'b0;
 end
+*/
+
+always @(wb_addr_i or dlab or dl or rf_data_out or ier or iir or lcr or lsr or msr)
+begin
+	case (wb_addr_i)
+	`UART_REG_RB : if (dlab) // Receiver FIFO or DL byte 1
+        			wb_dat_o <= dl[`UART_DL1];
+		        else
+			        wb_dat_o <= rf_data_out[9:2];
+	`UART_REG_IE	: wb_dat_o <= dlab ? dl[`UART_DL2] : ier;
+	`UART_REG_II	: wb_dat_o <= {4'b1100,iir};
+	`UART_REG_LC	: wb_dat_o <= lcr;
+	`UART_REG_LS	: wb_dat_o <= lsr;
+	`UART_REG_MS	: wb_dat_o <= msr;
+	default:  wb_dat_o <= 8'b0; // ??
+	endcase
+end
 
 // rf_pop signal handling
 always @(posedge clk or posedge wb_rst_i)

    UPD HdlOp@@AND_LOG to AND_LOG
        UPD HdlOp@@NEG_LOG to NEG_LOG
            UPD HdlValueId@@wb_we_i to wb_re_i
            MOV HdlValueId@@wb_we_i to ops
            HdlValueId: wb_we_i
            DEL list@@ops from NEG_LOG
        DEL HdlOp@@NEG_LOG from ops

    UPD HdlOp@@AND_LOG to AND_LOG
        UPD HdlOp@@NEG_LOG to NEG_LOG
            UPD HdlValueId@@wb_we_i to wb_re_i
            MOV HdlValueId@@wb_we_i to ops
            HdlValueId: wb_we_i
            DEL list@@ops from NEG_LOG
        DEL HdlOp@@NEG_LOG from ops

HdlIdDef: counter_b
    HdlOp: PARAMETRIZATION
        list: ops
            HdlValueId: reg
            HdlOp: DOWNTO
                list: ops
                    HdlValueInt: 7
                    HdlValueInt: 0
    HdlDirection: OUT

UPD HdlIdDef@@counter_b to counter_b
    UPD HdlDirection@@OUT to INTERNAL

UPD HdlIdDef@@rf_data_out to rf_data_out
    UPD HdlOp@@PARAMETRIZATION to PARAMETRIZATION
        UPD HdlOp@@DOWNTO to DOWNTO
            UPD HdlOp@@SUB to SUB
                UPD HdlValueInt@@10 to 11

MOV HdlIdDef@@rcounter16_eq_7 to objs
HdlIdDef: rcounter16_eq_7
    HdlOp: EQ
        list: ops
            HdlValueId: rcounter16
            HdlValueInt: 7
    HdlDirection: INTERNAL

MOV HdlIdDef@@rcounter16_eq_0 to objs
HdlIdDef: rcounter16_eq_0
    HdlOp: EQ
        list: ops
            HdlValueId: rcounter16
            HdlValueInt: 0
    HdlDirection: INTERNAL

MOV HdlIdDef@@rcounter16_eq_1 to objs
HdlIdDef: rcounter16_eq_1
    HdlOp: EQ
        list: ops
            HdlValueId: rcounter16
            HdlValueInt: 1
    HdlDirection: INTERNAL

MOV HdlIdDef@@rcounter16_minus_1 to objs
HdlIdDef: rcounter16_minus_1
    HdlOp: PARAMETRIZATION
        list: ops
            HdlValueId: wire
            HdlOp: DOWNTO
                list: ops
                    HdlValueInt: 3
                    HdlValueInt: 0
    HdlOp: SUB
        list: ops
            HdlValueId: rcounter16
            HdlValueInt: 1
    HdlDirection: INTERNAL

MOV HdlModuleDef@@uart_receiver to objs
HdlModuleDef: uart_receiver
    HdlModuleDec: uart_receiver
        list: params
            HdlIdDef: sr_idle
                HdlValueInt: 0
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_rec_start
                HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_rec_bit
                HdlValueInt: 2
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_rec_parity
                HdlValueInt: 3
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_rec_stop
                HdlValueInt: 4
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_check_parity
                HdlValueInt: 5
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_rec_prepare
                HdlValueInt: 6
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_end_bit
                HdlValueInt: 7
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_ca_lc_parity
                HdlValueInt: 8
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_wait1
                HdlValueInt: 9
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_push
                HdlValueInt: 10
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_last
                HdlValueInt: 11
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
        list: ports
            HdlIdDef: clk
                HdlDirection: IN
            HdlIdDef: wb_rst_i
                HdlDirection: IN
            HdlIdDef: lcr
                HdlOp: PARAMETRIZATION
                    list: ops
                        HdlValueId: wire
                        HdlOp: DOWNTO
                            list: ops
                                HdlValueInt: 7
                                HdlValueInt: 0
                HdlDirection: IN
            HdlIdDef: rf_pop
                HdlDirection: IN
            HdlIdDef: srx_pad_i

                        HdlValueId: clk
                HdlOp: RISING
                    list: ops
                        HdlValueId: wb_rst_i

                            HdlValueInt: 191
                            HdlValueId: counter_b
                            HdlValueInt: 1
                        list: elifs

                        HdlValueId: clk

UPD HdlStmProcess@@ to 
    UPD HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to SEQ
        UPD list@@body to objs
        MOV list@@body to SEQ
        list: body
            HdlStmIf
                HdlValueId: wb_rst_i
                HdlStmBlock: SEQ
                    list: body
                        HdlStmAssign

--- a/rtl/verilog/uart_receiver.v
+++ b/rtl/verilog/uart_receiver.v
@@ -210,14 +214,24 @@ begin

   end
   else
+	  if (break_error && rstate != sr_idle) // break condition met while receiver is not idle
+	  begin
+		  rstate 		 <= #1 sr_idle;
+		  rf_data_in 	 <= #1 {8'b0, 3'b100}; // break input (empty character) to receiver FIFO
+		  rf_push 		 <= #1 1'b1;
+	  end
   if (enable)
   begin
 	case (rstate)
-	sr_idle :	if (srx_pad_i==1'b0)   // detected a pulse (start bit?)

+			rf_push 			  <= #1 1'b0;
+			rf_data_in 	  <= #1 0;
+			if (srx_pad_i==1'b0)   // detected a pulse (start bit?)
 			begin

+		end

 				if (rcounter16_eq_7)    // check the pulse
 					if (srx_pad_i==1'b1)   // no start bit

UPD HdlStmIf@@ to 
    UPD list@@elifs to body
    MOV list@@elifs to 
    list: elifs
        tuple
            HdlValueId: enable
            HdlStmBlock: SEQ
                list: body
                    HdlStmCase: rstate
                        HdlStmCaseType: CASE
                        HdlValueId: rstate
                        list: cases
                            tuple
                                HdlValueId: sr_idle

                                    HdlOp: EQ

                                            HdlStmIf: if_true

                                                list: elifs

                                                    HdlValueId: rstate

UPD HdlStmIf@@ to 
    INS list@@elifs to 

UPD HdlStmCase@@rstate to rstate
    INS HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to 
    UPD HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to SEQ
        INS list@@body to SEQ


CommitId: adc9703413abe76bf2b2a2fc3c40da823d6b435b
Lots of fixes:
--- a/rtl/verilog/uart_receiver.v
+++ b/rtl/verilog/uart_receiver.v

MOV HdlModuleDef@@uart_receiver to objs
HdlModuleDef: uart_receiver
    HdlModuleDec: uart_receiver
        list: params
            HdlIdDef: sr_idle
                HdlValueInt: 0
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_rec_start
                HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_rec_bit
                HdlValueInt: 2
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_rec_parity
                HdlValueInt: 3
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_rec_stop
                HdlValueInt: 4
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_check_parity
                HdlValueInt: 5
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_rec_prepare
                HdlValueInt: 6
                HdlDirection: INTERNAL
            HdlIdDef: sr_end_bit

        HdlOp: RISING
            list: ops
                HdlValueId: clk

UPD HdlStmIf@@ to 
    INS list@@elifs to 

UPD HdlStmCase@@rstate to rstate
    INS HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to 
    UPD HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to SEQ
        INS list@@body to SEQ

    UPD HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to SEQ
        UPD list@@body to objs
        MOV list@@body to SEQ
        list: body
            HdlStmIf
                HdlValueId: wb_rst_i

                    list: body
                        HdlStmAssign

                                                    HdlStmAssign
                                                        HdlOp: EQ
                                                            list: ops
                                                                HdlValueId: rparity_xor
                                                                HdlValueInt: 0
                                                        HdlValueId: rparity_error
                                                        HdlValueInt: 1
                                                tuple
                                                    HdlValueInt: 01
                                                    HdlStmAssign
                                                        HdlOp: NEG
                                                            list: ops
                                                                HdlValueId: rparity
                                                        HdlValueId: rparity_error
                                                        HdlValueInt: 1
                                                tuple
                                                    HdlValueInt: 10
                                                    HdlStmAssign
                                                        HdlOp: EQ
                                                            list: ops
                                                                HdlValueId: rparity_xor
                                                                HdlValueInt: 1
                                                        HdlValueId: rparity_error
                                                        HdlValueInt: 1
                                                tuple
                                                    HdlValueInt: 11
                                                    HdlStmAssign
                                                        HdlValueId: rparity
                                                        HdlValueId: rparity_error
                                                        HdlValueInt: 1
                                        HdlStmAssign
                                            HdlValueId: rcounter16_minus_1
                                            HdlValueId: rcounter16
                                            HdlValueInt: 1
                                        HdlStmAssign
                                            HdlValueId: sr_wait1
                                            HdlValueId: rstate
                                            HdlValueInt: 1
                            tuple
                                HdlValueId: sr_wait1
                                HdlStmIf
                                    HdlValueId: rcounter16_eq_0
                                    HdlStmBlock: SEQ
                                        list: body
                                            HdlStmAssign
                                                HdlValueId: sr_rec_stop
                                                HdlValueId: rstate
                                                HdlValueInt: 1
                                            HdlStmAssign
                                                HdlValueInt: 1110
                                                HdlValueId: rcounter16
                                                HdlValueInt: 1
                                    list: elifs
                                    HdlStmAssign: if_false
                                        HdlValueId: rcounter16_minus_1
                                        HdlValueId: rcounter16
                                        HdlValueInt: 1
                            tuple
                                HdlValueId: sr_rec_stop
                                HdlStmBlock: SEQ
                                    list: body
                                        HdlStmIf
                                            HdlValueId: rcounter16_eq_7
                                            HdlStmBlock: SEQ
                                                list: body
                                                    HdlStmAssign
                                                        HdlOp: NEG_LOG
                                                            list: ops
                                                                HdlValueId: srx_pad_i
                                                        HdlValueId: rframing_error
                                                        HdlValueInt: 1
                                                    HdlStmAssign
                                                        HdlValueId: sr_push
                                                        HdlValueId: rstate
                                                        HdlValueInt: 1
                                            list: elifs
                                        HdlStmAssign
                                            HdlValueId: rcounter16_minus_1
                                            HdlValueId: rcounter16
                                            HdlValueInt: 1
                            tuple
                                HdlValueId: sr_push
                                HdlStmBlock: SEQ
                                    list: body
                                        HdlStmAssign
                                            HdlOp: CONCAT
                                                list: ops
                                                    HdlOp: CONCAT
                                                        list: ops
                                                            HdlValueId: rshift
                                                            HdlValueId: rparity_error
                                                    HdlValueId: rframing_error
                                            HdlValueId: rf_data_in
                                            HdlValueInt: 1
                                        HdlStmAssign
                                            HdlValueInt: 1
                                            HdlValueId: rf_push
                                            HdlValueInt: 1
                                        HdlStmAssign
                                            HdlValueId: sr_last
                                            HdlValueId: rstate
                                            HdlValueInt: 1
                            tuple
                                HdlValueId: sr_last
                                HdlStmBlock: SEQ
                                    list: body
                                        HdlStmIf
                                            HdlValueId: rcounter16_eq_1
                                            HdlStmAssign: if_true
                                                HdlValueId: sr_idle
                                                HdlValueId: rstate
                                                HdlValueInt: 1
                                            list: elifs
                                        HdlStmAssign
                                            HdlValueId: rcounter16_minus_1
                                            HdlValueId: rcounter16
                                            HdlValueInt: 1
                                        HdlStmAssign
                                            HdlValueInt: 0
                                            HdlValueId: rf_push
                                            HdlValueInt: 1
                        HdlStmAssign: default
                            HdlValueId: sr_idle
                            HdlValueId: rstate
                            HdlValueInt: 1

UPD HdlStmIf@@ to 
    INS list@@elifs to 

UPD HdlStmCase@@rstate to rstate
    INS HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to 
    UPD HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to SEQ
        INS list@@body to SEQ

    UPD HdlOp@@AND to AND
        INS HdlOp@@AND to ops

            INS HdlOp@@NEG to ops
            HdlOp: NEG
                list: ops
                    HdlValueId: pop

    UPD HdlOp@@AND to AND
        MOV HdlValueId@@push to ops
        HdlValueId: push

CommitId: 7541191f9fd47d7786dea286e52815a2cfbb8368
This fixes errors in some cases when data is being read and put to the FIFO at the same time. Patch is submitted by Scott Furman. Update is very recommended.
--- a/rtl/verilog/uart_regs.v
+++ b/rtl/verilog/uart_regs.v
@@ -585,7 +588,7 @@ always @(posedge clk or posedge wb_rst_i)
 
 always @(posedge clk or posedge wb_rst_i)
 	if (wb_rst_i) lsr0r <= #1 0;
-	else lsr0r <= #1 (rf_count==1 && fifo_read || rx_reset) ? 0 : // deassert condition
+	else lsr0r <= #1 (rf_count==1 && rf_pop && !rf_push_pulse || rx_reset) ? 0 : // deassert condition
 					  lsr0r || (lsr0 && ~lsr0_d); // set on rise of lsr0 and keep asserted until deasserted 
 
 // lsr bit 1 (receiver overrun)
ParseResult:
INS HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs

UPD HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs
    INS list@@params to uart_regs
    INS list@@ports to uart_regs
    INS list@@objs to uart_regs

UPD HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs
    DEL list@@params from uart_regs
    DEL list@@ports from uart_regs
    DEL list@@objs from uart_regs

UPD HdlStmAssign@@ to 
    INS HdlOp@@CONCAT to 
    HdlOp: CONCAT
        list: ops
            HdlOp: CONCAT
                list: ops
                    HdlOp: CONCAT
                        list: ops
                            HdlValueId: cts_c
                            HdlValueId: dsr_c
                    HdlValueId: ri_c
            HdlValueId: dcd_c

        INS HdlOp@@CONCAT to ops
        HdlOp: CONCAT
            list: ops
                HdlOp: CONCAT

 	else

-assign we_o = wb_we_i & wb_cyc_i & wb_stb_i; //WE for registers	
+assign we_o =  wb_we_i & wb_cyc_i & wb_stb_i; //WE for registers

ParseResult:
INS HdlStmAssign@@ to objs
HdlStmAssign
    HdlOp: AND
        list: ops
            HdlOp: AND
                list: ops
                    HdlOp: NEG
                        list: ops
                            HdlValueId: wb_we_i
                    HdlValueId: wb_cyc_i
            HdlValueId: wb_stb_i
    HdlValueId: re_o

UPD HdlStmIf@@ to 
    UPD HdlStmBlock@@SEQ to SEQ
        INS list@@body to SEQ

UPD HdlStmAssign@@ to 
    INS HdlOp@@AND to 
    INS HdlValueId@@wb_ack_o to 
    UPD HdlOp@@AND to AND
        INS HdlOp@@NEG to ops
        UPD HdlOp@@NEG to NEG
            INS list@@ops to NEG

INS HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs

UPD HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs
    INS list@@params to uart_regs
    INS list@@ports to uart_regs
    INS list@@objs to uart_regs

MOV HdlIdDef@@trigger_level to objs
HdlIdDef: trigger_level
    HdlOp: PARAMETRIZATION
        list: ops
            HdlValueId: reg
            HdlOp: DOWNTO
                list: ops
                    HdlValueInt: 3
                    HdlValueInt: 0
    HdlDirection: INTERNAL

MOV HdlIdDef@@rx_reset to objs
HdlIdDef: rx_reset
    HdlOp: PARAMETRIZATION
        list: ops
            HdlValueId: reg
    HdlDirection: INTERNAL

UPD HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs
    DEL list@@params from uart_regs
    DEL list@@ports from uart_regs
    DEL list@@objs from uart_regs

DEL HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs from uart_regs

+`ifdef DATA_BUS_WIDTH_8
+`else
+// if 32-bit databus and debug interface are enabled
+output [3:0]							ier;
+output [3:0]							iir;
+output [1:0]							fcr;  /// bits 7 and 6 of fcr. Other bits are ignored
+output [4:0]							mcr;
+output [7:0]							lcr;
+output [7:0]							msr;
+output [7:0] 							lsr;
+output [`UART_FIFO_COUNTER_W-1:0] 	rf_count;
+output [`UART_FIFO_COUNTER_W-1:0] 	tf_count;
+output [2:0] 							tstate;
+output [3:0] 							rstate;
+
+`endif

    INS list@@params to uart_regs
    INS list@@ports to uart_regs
    INS list@@objs to uart_regs

    HdlOp: PARAMETRIZATION

                list: ops
                    HdlValueInt: 7
                    HdlValueInt: 0
    HdlDirection: INTERNAL

    UPD HdlDirection@@INTERNAL to OUT

UPD HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs
    DEL list@@params from uart_regs
    DEL list@@ports from uart_regs
    DEL list@@objs from uart_regs

DEL HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs from uart_regs

INS HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs

UPD HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs
    INS list@@params to uart_regs
    INS list@@ports to uart_regs
    INS list@@objs to uart_regs

UPD HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs
    DEL list@@params from uart_regs
    DEL list@@ports from uart_regs
    DEL list@@objs from uart_regs

DEL HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs from uart_regs

INS HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs

UPD HdlModuleDec@@uart_regs to uart_regs
    INS list@@params to uart_regs
    INS list@@ports to uart_regs
    INS list@@objs to uart_regs

MOV HdlStmProcess@@ to objs
HdlStmProcess
    list: sensitivity
        HdlOp: RISING
            list: ops
                HdlValueId: clk
        HdlOp: RISING
            list: ops
                HdlValueId: wb_rst_i
    HdlStmIf: body
        HdlValueId: wb_rst_i
        HdlStmAssign: if_true
            HdlValueInt: 0
            HdlValueId: mcr
            HdlValueInt: 1
        list: elifs
            tuple
                HdlOp: AND_LOG
                    list: ops
                        HdlValueId: wb_we_i
                        HdlOp: EQ
                            list: ops
                                HdlValueId: wb_addr_i
                                HdlValueInt: 4
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlOp: INDEX
                        list: ops
                            HdlValueId: wb_dat_i
                            HdlOp: DOWNTO
                                list: ops
                                    HdlValueInt: 4
                                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: mcr
                    HdlValueInt: 1

MOV HdlStmProcess@@ to objs
HdlStmProcess
    list: sensitivity
        HdlOp: RISING
            list: ops
                HdlValueId: clk
        HdlOp: RISING
            list: ops
                HdlValueId: wb_rst_i
    HdlStmIf: body
        HdlValueId: wb_rst_i
        HdlStmBlock: SEQ
            list: body
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlOp: INDEX
                        list: ops
                            HdlValueId: dl
                            HdlOp: DOWNTO
                                list: ops
                                    HdlValueInt: 7
                                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: tf_push
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                HdlStmAssign
                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: start_dlc
                    HdlValueInt: 1
        list: elifs
            tuple
                HdlOp: AND_LOG
                    list: ops
                        HdlValueId: wb_we_i
                        HdlOp: EQ
                            list: ops
                                HdlValueId: wb_addr_i
                                HdlValueInt: 0
                HdlStmIf
                    HdlValueId: dlab
                    HdlStmBlock: SEQ
                        list: body
                            HdlStmAssign
                                HdlValueId: wb_dat_i
                                HdlOp: INDEX
                                    list: ops
                                        HdlValueId: dl
                                        HdlOp: DOWNTO
                                            list: ops

            list: ops
                HdlValueId: clk
        HdlOp: RISING
            list: ops
                HdlValueId: wb_rst_i
    HdlStmBlock: SEQ
        list: body

                HdlValueId: wb_rst_i

                    HdlValueInt: 0
                    HdlValueId: lsr_mask_d
                    HdlValueInt: 1
                list: elifs
                HdlStmAssign: if_false
                    HdlValueId: lsr_mask_condition
                    HdlValueId: lsr_mask_d
                    HdlValueInt: 1
